attributes.action: the illness of m.e and fibromyalgia to be taken more seriously
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
my wife suffers with m.e and fibromyalgia and has had alot of problems with doctors not knowing very much about the illnesses. they are usually together when you contract them.
my wife has been to doctors and they say that they cannot treat her as not much is known about the illnesses she has, i amsure she is not the only one.
i call for more training for doctors on the diagnosis of these illnesses, along with the dwp doctors, as we are on benefits she is basically disabled by these illnesses. m.e, when you get it is for the rest of your life if not treated in time or in the right way.
i also call for dwp to recognise these illnesses, as dwp in my opinion do not take them seriously.
last but not least, more help for people like my wife.
